name: Boo Ring
description:
Holy Awesome!

This boo ring is great to wear around halloween but I love mine so much that I wear it year round. It is made of perler beads, backed with foam and attached to a gold-toned adjustable ring.

Dimensions (approximate):

1.75" x 1.75" (english) 4.45 cm x 4.45 cm (metric)

This ring is not intended for children under 3 years of age.

name: Gold Dollar Sign Perler Bead Necklace
description:
Well ok, its not gold. It is made of yellow perler beads. Pimp out your wardrobe with awesomeness!

There are 32 chain links and it is approximately 32" long. It will fit over most heads -- if you would like it longer just convo me for details.

This necklace is not intended for children under 3 years of age.

name: Pimp Grid Glasses
description:
These glasses will make you instantly cool, guaranteed!

They are entirely made out of perler beads. The three pieces are sewn together which means you can open and close them and throw them into your bag without worrying that they will break.

Dimensions (approximate):

front glasses part
6.25" x 2.5" (english)
15.88 cm x 6.35 cm (metric)

They are not intended for children under 3 years of age.

Want a different color scheme? Convo me!

name: Mario Rainbow Suit Wall Art
description:
Mario is on drugs.

Would make any wall ever in existence the coolest wall ever.

It is made entirely of perler beads, backed with foam and comes with all the necessary hardware to hang it.

Measures approximately 10.5" x 9" or if you are more into metric measurements 26.67 cm x 22.86 cm.

This is not intended for children under 3 years of age.

name: Mario Item Block Box Magnet w/ 2 coin magnets
description:
Item block box with a magnet on the back, looks awesome on your fridge! The lid comes off so you can store secret notes inside!

This is a Magnet Games Original! Would make a great gift for the geek in your life!

Set Includes:

1 Item Block Box
2 Coin Magnets

Dimensions:

box: 2"x2"x2"
coins: 1.5"x1.25"

Each item is backed with foam and comes with a strong ceramic magnet! Please note the item block magnet will stick strongly to your fridge put is not designed to hold up papers.

This set is not intended for children under 3 years of age.
